cim.screen.label.0: In 'cim_models.json', the 'components' field is strictly for static filtering (exact match).
cim.screen.label.1: Avoid using dynamic data (like Damage or Bow Pull) here, otherwise the model will reset repeatedly.
cim.screen.label.2: Use unique animations names for dynamics. It allows you to control animations based on component values.
cim.screen.label.3: Animations support: Cooldowns, Item Usage, Display Context, and Active Hand.
